methods.name: getAll
methods.summary: Used to obtain information about all published security advisories. By default the output is in JSON. To obtain the output in XML use the .xml extension. For example, /advisories/all.xml
methods.description: Used to obtain information about all published security advisories. By default the output is in JSON. To obtain the output in XML use the .xml extension. For example, /advisories/all.xml

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getCveCveId
methods.summary: Used to obtain an advisory using a given Common Vulnerability Enumerator (CVE). The `cve_id` format is CVE-YYYY-NNNN. For more information about CVE visit http://cve.mitre.org/
methods.description: Used to obtain an advisory using a given Common Vulnerability Enumerator (CVE). The `cve_id` format is CVE-YYYY-NNNN. For more information about CVE visit http://cve.mitre.org/

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getAdvisoryAdvisoryId
methods.summary: Used to obtain an advisory given its advisory ID `advisory_id` (i.e., cisco-sa-20180221-ucdm)
methods.description: Used to obtain an advisory given its advisory ID `advisory_id` (i.e., cisco-sa-20180221-ucdm)

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getSeveritySeverity
methods.summary: Used to obtain all security advisories for a given security impact rating (critical, high, medium, or low).
methods.description: Used to obtain all security advisories for a given security impact rating (critical, high, medium, or low).

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getSeveritySeverityLastpublished
methods.summary: Used to obtain all security advisories for a given security impact rating (critical, high, medium, or low).
methods.description: Used to obtain all security advisories for a given security impact rating (critical, high, medium, or low).

input.name: severity
input.info: Used to obtain all advisories that have a security impact rating of critical

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getSeveritySeverityFirstpublished
methods.summary: Used to obtain all security advisories for a given security impact rating (critical, high, medium, or low) and additionally filter based of firstpublished start date and enddate.
methods.description: Used to obtain all security advisories for a given security impact rating (critical, high, medium, or low) and additionally filter based of firstpublished start date and enddate.

input.name: severity
input.info: Used to obtain all advisories that have a security impact rating of critical

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getYearYear
methods.summary: Used to obtain all security advisories that have were orginally published in a specific year `YYYY`.
methods.description: Used to obtain all security advisories that have were orginally published in a specific year `YYYY`.

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getLatestNumber
methods.summary: Used to obtain all the latest security advisories given an absolute number. For instance, the latest 10 or latest 5.
methods.description: Used to obtain all the latest security advisories given an absolute number. For instance, the latest 10 or latest 5.

input.name: number
input.info: An absolute number to obtain the latest security advisories.

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getProduct
methods.summary: Used to obtain all the advisories that affects the given product name.
methods.description: Used to obtain all the advisories that affects the given product name.

input.name: product
input.info: An product name to obtain security advisories that matches given product name.

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getIos
methods.summary: Used to obtain all advisories that affects the given ios version
methods.description: Used to obtain all advisories that affects the given ios version

input.name: version
input.info: IOS version to obtain security advisories

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

methods.name: getIosxe
methods.summary: Used to obtain all advisories that affects the given ios version
methods.description: Used to obtain all advisories that affects the given ios version

input.name: version
input.info: IOS version to obtain security advisories

output.name: result
